channel.title: 2 problems one in pimpscape and another in testscape
channel.description:
ok 1s the pimpscape problem ok here goes ive just got an pimpscape sever but i do not want it to be a pk sever because i hate them could someone nice enough please tell me how to make pimpscape an non pking sever thank you to who ever helps me
ok second questian in testscape ive changed the player rights on my charter to 3 and then i close the charters folder compile sever and run but i do not have a crown and ive head you need code to make your self an admin in testscape can someone pleae help me thank you

item.title: 2 problems one in pimpscape and another in testscape
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

here is for question 2

here is a small tut for making yourself an admin in testscape

Open client.java

search admin
keep hiting the find next button untill you see

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

Go down and and find a name with 3 as there rights and change here name to yours

if there isnt any other names then add this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your players name")) { playerRights = 3; }

And when you log into your server you cant see your crown anyways for some reason in testscape. And im not sure how to change that but use an admin only command to make sure it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 problems one in pimpscape and another in testscape

item.title: 2 problems one in pimpscape and another in testscape

item.title: 2 problems one in pimpscape and another in testscape
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

for player rights:

open up client.java

Find:

admin list

Scroll down under you see something like this:

/*checkmods(); checkadmins(); checkstaff(); if(checkmods() == 5) playerRights = 1; if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) playerRights = 2; if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod darren")) playerRights = 3;*/
after the

*/

Press the enter key twice and copy & paste this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")) { playerRights = 3; }
Where it says “NAMEHERE” put the account name you want to be owner of the Server.

Where it says:

playerRights = 3;

You can change the numbers 0-3

0 = Player (no rights, no crown)
1 = Moderator
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

Read full topic
